name: Brian TYSON, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent

judges: Justice GREENSPAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Brian TYSON, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of August, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted. The Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus Ad Subjiciendum — King’s Bench Matter and Application for an Immediate Hearing are denied.
Justice GREENSPAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
955 A.2d 1011
Brian TYSON, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 27, 2008.
